Cash Bonus
Coin Bonus
Cells/Kill Bonus
Free Upgrades
Packages
Enemy Level Skips
Cash Bonus
Cash Bonus enhancement is unlocked for free after completing the Workshop Enhancement Labs. Increases the Cash Bonus multiplier by x1 when unlocked and increases by 0.01x per level. The Cash workshop enhancement also increases the cash per wave, interest percentage, and max interest per wave amount by 1% each upgrade as well. Has a maximum level of 400 for a 5x bonus.
Level
Value
Coins
Expand
Total Coins
1

Coin Bonus
Requires 50 billion coins to be spent on Utility enhancements to unlock. Increases the Coin Bonus multiplier by x1 when unlocked and increases by 0.01x per level. Has a maximum level of 200 for a 3x bonus. Note: Coin Bonus enhancement affects tier bonus and Coins/kill. This means the overall benefit of Coin Bonus enhancement is squared.
Level
Value
Coins
Expand
Total Coins

Cells/Kill Bonus
Requires 500 billion coins to be spent on Utility enhancements to unlock. Increases Cells/Kill by x1 when unlocked and increases by 0.01x per level. Has a maximum level of 200 for a 3x bonus.

Coins

Free Upgrades
Requires 5 trillion coins to be spent on Utility enhancements to unlock. Increases all Free Upgrades by x1 when unlocked and increases by 0.01x per level. Has a maximum level of 100 for a 2x bonus.

Packages
Requires 50 trillion coins to be spent on Utility enhancements to unlock. Increases Max Recovery Package and Recovery Amount by x1 when unlocked and increases by 0.01x per level. Has a maximum level of 300 for a 4x bonus.

Enemy Level Skips
Requires 500 trillion coins to be spent on Utility enhancements to unlock. Increases Enemy Health and Enemy Damage Level Skip multiplier by x1 when unlocked and increases by 0.01x per level. Has a maximum level of 60 for a 1.6x bonus.
